verses.roman:
ācārya-caraṇe mora koṭi namaskāra
ithe kichu aparādha nā labe āmāra

synonyms: ācārya-caraṇe—at the lotus feet of Advaita Ācārya; mora—my; koṭi namaskāra—offering obeisances ten million times; ithe—in this connection; kichu—some; aparādha—offense; nā labe—please do not take; āmāra—my.
translation: I offer my obeisances ten million times to the lotus feet of Śrī Advaita Ācārya. Please do not take offense at this.
